subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pablo Prigioni, the oldest rookie in the N.B.A. at age 35, came off the bench to score 11 points, which tied his season-high and handed out 7 assists, as the Knicks beat the Bucks.
snippet: Pablo Prigioni, the oldest rookie in the N.B.A. at age 35, came off the bench to score 11 points, which tied his season-high and handed out 7 assists, as the Knicks beat the Bucks.
